title: Golden oldies
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Derek Wright and Arthur Everard
brief_description: There are 80-year-olds who still jog, play golf, paint the roof of their house, work their farms and generally enjoy the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A positive look at ‘old age’ in the golden time of life.
